creator: Selmo
descriptionHtml:
- Always manage room temperature regulation all around the house
- Set the temperatures of each operating mode
- Set the operating mode among those already available on your thermostat
- Set a weekly schedule for each thermostat
- Turn on and off all functions of each thermostat
- Conveniently organize your thermostats into groups
- Monitor the performance of your heating system

Connect to the Wi-Fi network generated by the thermostat to connect it to your home network and you’ll be able to effortlessly control it directly from the app anytime and anywhere, adding them to your personal account.

What do I do to configure a new thermostat?
- Once you have downloaded the app, make sure you are connected to the Internet and create your personal account by entering an email address and a password
- Start the configuration procedure directly from the app tapping [+ Add New Thermostat]
- Follow the on-screen instructions carefully, step by step
- Connect the thermostat to your home Wi-Fi network
- Link the thermostat to your account through the thermostat QR code
- Give the thermostat a name and place it in a group and it will appear in your list of devices
- Now you have control of the thermostat. Enjoy.

You can locally control all compatible thermostats like the One through the Comfort One app:
- Tap on the “BLE” tab and then on [+ Add new thermostat] to begin the search. Make sure that Location services and Bluetooth are turned on.
- Tap on any detected thermostat to give it a name.
- The thermostat will be added to your list of thermostats and you’ll be able to control it when you’re in its proximity.

The app can be used with any compatible Selmo thermostat. You will need a wireless network with Internet access to take advantage of the thermostat remote control functionality of the app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
eBlitz compatibility was added in this version of Domus One.

We've added support for our Russian, Portugese, Spanish and German-speaking pals, while our French, Italian and English-speaking mates will appreciate this fresh update.

We've also exterminated all those pesky tiny bugs. Nobody likes bugs.

Keep embracing comfort with Domus One!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added a pop-up reminder regarding geolocation services to prevent common mistakes during the setup of the thermostat.
